item.title: Nerds Fixing Stuff: Roof Leak, Part 1
item.description: The Setup In August of last year I purchased a new house in the ‘burbs to accommodate my ever growing family. We went by the books and got the home inspection done which yielded some pretty low-hanging-fruit issues such as… Don’t have rain barrels near your foundation Maybe upgrade that outdoor tap to have a frost nib Eventually you’ll need to replace your shingles I prioritized some of the work in the results and carried on with my life.
